view

Class InventoryGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.InventoryGUI

  • public class InventoryGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Joey The InventoryGUI class will display a table of all the inventory items to the seller. The seller will be able to add to the iventory, update items on the list, and will be able to delete items
